item.title: Modified RuneScape Window Opener(OUT OF BETA) :)
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

[glow=green,2,300]Ok this is my first(Well Highly edited script)
Brand New And download link at bottom![/glow]

[glow=red,100,300]Some Cool Stuff!
–Hides SCAR so it makes it look like a human is doing something!–
–I have 2 download links, 1 For before (My first ever script (unedited)–
–And a after(Now) Highly edited–
–IT will just show how much i improved in a week and a half. XD[/glow]

For People Who cant download the link…
Here ya go!

[scar]{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++ Sebo’s RuneScape Window Opener/Loginer ++]
[+ Made by: Sebo! +]
[+ Credits- Weibs, And all the people who help me on Mopar. +]
[+ Setup Lines/Username/Password Setup on - 45-46 +]
[+ Enjoi, my script +]
[+ Other: I spent over 6 weeks perfecting this script. +]
[+ And I acctually might start using SRL, Once I Furgure out how to. +]
[+ Use it. +]
[++ 350+ Lines of Script!!! ++]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Program RuneScape_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
Existing, Tool, Play, x, y : Integer;
Start: String;

//////////////////////////////////////////////
Const/////////////////////////Setup///////////
UserName = ‘UserName Here’; //Username HERE //
PassWord = ‘PassWord Here’; //Password HERE //
//////////////////////////////////////////////

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
Start:=Readln(‘Start Script?’);
Wait(1500);
Writeln(‘You Said ‘+Start+’, Thanks for using my Runescape’);
Writeln(‘Window Opener and loginer!’);

Tool := BitmapFromString(13, 8, ‘2139713A5F8E70A8C893DBEF9C’ +
‘EDFE98F0FE8AF1FE78EDFE69EBFD5CDEFB4DD2FA4CD2FB4CC4F06’ +
‘AA1C2A3EBFAB0FEFFA6FDFF92F0FE83EFFD75F6FD6BF3FC60E8FB’ +
‘4ED7F940C8F73BC2F63BC1F5B3FEFFB5FFFF98F3FE83DDFA5FB0D’ +
‘168B4D168F0FB59E3F94AD3F73BC4F632B8F22EB3EF30B0EFAEFE’ +
‘FF89E4FD69BCDF4370A15E90B568DBF358DDF748D1F73BC2F432B’ +
‘7F02DB0ED2BABEC2BA9EB81DAF75BABCF26417A4C7EA964D6F151’ +
‘D6F53DBBEC30A7E12A9DDC279FDF2BA6E82BA8EA2BA4E94B8DB72’ +
‘23B734182AB5AD5F14CD1F435A8DF237FB51E689B1C63931F76B0’ +
‘2494D72A9FE4299EE62138703F8BB35CD4F24ED6F736ABE11F639’ +
‘51936621A305F1934631838661A487B2388CC299BE53985AE55D2’ +
‘F151D6F73EBFF02374A8162A531D356B1E346E1C356E1C356E1C3’ +
‘66D1C528B2995DE’);
If(Findbitmap(Tool, x ,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 15, 15, 14, 58, 12);
Wait(150+Random(150));
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(43);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;

Procedure BoredMouse;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15, 15, 35, 50, 15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(Findcolor(x, y, 14258485, 5, 22, 971, 253));
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x, y, 14258485, 5,22, 971, 253))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 15, 14, 16, 58, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(6000)
End;

Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(175)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(141)
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(165)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(74)
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(127)
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(61)
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(45)
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(116)
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(215)
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(143)
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(111)
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(122)
SendKeys(‘m’ +chr(13));
Wait(111)
Wait(3421)
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
Play := BitmapFromString(13, 17, ‘z78DAA5935B8E85400844B724’ +
‘D0CFCF7E78F7BFA461284CDA8C1A73E7A74C040F50204F2EBC4DE’ +
‘A398F37DAF75672A8B5C4D84390C64D84076FABBEA7AD3AA4F51C’ +
‘9439859CB671FA9606459FCF349FA20B7390C2BB3EAC8752728A7’ +
‘4EAB0B44F4ECF930692C475A53DE7AF3917D19573F4A6DD56CA33’ +
‘A6DBDE2CF35FBE6DCA9F5ABB91EB779C5E1BA71D53B05D9AF6366’ +
‘97F750FA34BAE20949E9BEE119CC1913A549210D73B57E1D549D7’ +
‘EDD83D382D3151955D2AA70B9AB9FA86F6AB34BC377B7FD99B3AA’ +
‘0B50A8F5B1A360EA6F98FE8052D691623EABA49E4E41CA8B9E475’ +
‘E14C95C9179E6BACEAC6EDAB1373259B1BFCE17C68E06BDFDC07D’ +
‘C249856D7FFB8A1B486E94E3BC57BE4A3A2CDE83956D1A7F83B2F’ +
‘7AB329FCDE6CA7C8591D46D433C13C578463BE8563A73F315724A’ +
‘D’);
If(FindBitmap(Play, x, y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 14, 21, 15, 54, 2);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 66104, 556, 331, 783, 449, 10))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 15, 15, 15, 39, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x, y, 2109487, 340, 246, 578, 384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x,y, 15, 15, 15, 10, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(4000);
Existing := BitmapFromString(142, 33, ‘z78DAED5DD172DB300CF’ +
‘BA52476BAF6315D9BFFFFA46D751FE8A30181A498ADBB6637DDCE’ +
‘912525210C90A2B8F3CFF3DBE574FE682F2F97DBE5AEB767736F6’ +
‘E84DC8CBCCF725996E5756B73B3A011EC75FEEEDC4FCD677CE45C’ +
‘7D9F5D1FE1919696B36DDBDF8FF3B55AE59BE9F845D0C8B33E45D’ +
‘D1EA2F33EE6BBCAFD765FAB3DBDFEF9735ECEEBF9FA7F7CA2EFF6’ +
‘BB7D68EBB0B361CA226B7D5BEFD7DBFABCDEAEEBF6EFEBD3F5C7D’ +
‘362DBC1BBDB081DED36AF6B97DBF2BAAEEBE5F7DF77DF2EEFCB7D’ +
‘7DB1FFDEFADBBBD0F5DDBB661CA5F563EE5AFB2EEFB9B54FCBF37’ +
‘AF27AACD4F21995356C576C1F7BDDB6600D5C6DE61426BF6BD62C’ +
‘1B5E3EB163F0C531E5F1126D2D22EA23E41077D01320EEF38AB17’ +
‘38814015FB0CFB6AA1C36AD0D9B95ECECD9E245412B4790474D65’ +
‘34F46EF069C011D4815FDF278729C97A0D5E50FF0EFE2A8D69D7C’ +
‘F5183B089F0EB5B8B23F46E14950871C84EAC3D7BD6E0084258F0’ +
‘4CC451A3BCEB794D60BA1C1F855BB7861DA636050830E53962A7F’ +
‘738D690F53A9E42FC05398532DD040D89D8A4CE92411C49BAD1F3’ +
‘94EFAF58086AB94AEC5398D155291CC4F5AA3CFE80A728A676166’ +
‘2EC59D76F8A4736B8D758751841080BCE9E772C907A4A84D18498’ +
‘D1DB15424ACEDF413C223C8D77DE6874F6A83E2CA83EE8DF7135E’ +
‘B57DB8129A0EBA21C51F298804F5462256BC9B2A69DAB2D3DB3A0’ +
‘EB0326425C809EB7DE0BE3ECE03CCA521445F7D4A2AC8162230A2’ +
‘BC9B348310A85A7825A2BC05C5CF9704F445168281AE0586F1AA6’ +
‘10829C4ED3E31201BF09D9894710B7229D41E64620F5A866340A8’ +
‘A382B85A00A4FE52278010D86EC1FF9F2DCDE3C7FF9BB905AE368’ +
‘8A2A3A33EF2E265F1F53E03BC9DFD7A307B2169A100D88FA808A1’ +
‘7A6B076393658C754E30E14425065174CB6C9929D234CF9787B1D’ +
‘474835291A32AA0C51F45E186D608DC89799BA93151DF95FC0D44’ +
‘0D73916988653AE00F598B6AEB52A7B4C7C3D0A73715FC62348F1’ +
‘D4B81AACEF46457DA242E46D32FADAE27E7534CDDDD5BD0B2F091’ +
‘18A5FA67B7951F6D163E67E0F1AF4413DD13720C5DB39A6723BC8’ +
‘062F8AB557B0D087A34A8CA282820EDD68B173A2AFCACEE981D5F’ +
‘9273FE0971DBA756F88DB2AD078888F26EC7655B2A7F8BB82A2EB’ +
‘B0F9B9F8EAC6547B5E1FC514F75F0E9EF61E0B82DED32DF660858’ +
‘0DDF8989FF35A34A5A28550FB218FE9312D8D634751F01875C733’ +
‘3472B1F459FB38618F49C7949E3BE7FA23F5A858BE1D738029375’ +
‘7922F50FE21578C083B9C073B726B3B7280E5DCA48AE6ACEF4F25’ +
‘3D29613F2B10AF032C7080822D2FFDC3129006DB5D7773EDD4A3B’ +
‘93EF0E0005EB89767E7DA2C8DCFE223DB7C4618C170B6BDBBCB70’ +
‘E2EEBA63EDC16A9D3576F4CCE5E6CDD593733105ED3F9889A4F32’ +
‘0F7A7FC98E8D7F19E174268D483E3FD0F78CA3CC3D13A95FE7616’ +
‘29626390E5C7F1A8E1D7D1CB6316AD13ADC7DFF5B7E215B33015D’ +
‘E43411C2464CF2AFBC85CFBA191E1AF6334121F59671F6487E809’ +
‘AFE051EF8F6C98EB34D41FEA589D1F1166C1BCFC7B801841FB5C6’ +
‘5A424CF4FE939B4E53DDC8EB89FF792149EF25E06C494991D7201’ +
‘65523D8E51BF0E6D98EEAB06B0E99E0F39DED13503E2A647C6251’ +
‘AF3D2110781ECA0B911C2ED5E68F9660DBAF6B3C81A60CA3132EA’ +
‘AF445102F7CEC21A3D0312D57E07BB5D14CB8A56B479EF0AA6205’ +
‘BA1FCABE6A84800537AE4B69E7F1EC414E720C9D700B105649F83’ +
‘672CD58A153CE634986293C892A1FA0AF28ECE562846617933E02’ +
‘B35E4634CE6298A9A696722E4F624BC7C6C0DC6DC809241D7E1FE’ +
‘B2FB1E504F3FA6BD57B9EE7D16EE7FC1DD586B81F493F21995FED’ +
‘25DC64A95B844B44E5A2E4E38D99FA24CA464F7B59C48524653F2’ +
‘EB847A1481ECA6683E526E670DE4780CE224A8528DCF3C574E797’ +
‘4D7A3D0B3E529BE943C8AE8CEF2E43389BA0ED433E2A296A6D46C’ +
‘51701DCC5985A71779858AB6D3F428FE1FF0477CAC8C6789230B5’ +
‘7EA2675202E8A02AE06912F26ABC7648C6256F512179D0B9FD1D0’ +
‘994E419FFE94E8ABA226E747F96843C0AF899EA64727CA91EFAF7’ +
‘8317576AB9C73E4D923D1B35773631405AB0EEFF62AE7DC2BB556’ +
‘FAB0935B83CB3282513BC1E33BB07921B382FB5C52466E1D4D393’ +
‘D8670ADD4804AED7395FC296E6F1D4FF88AE5F3334A15C66C63A5’ +
‘52054E5E6F41CF1E4716E87271616500A51E45B4A28552DD42396’ +
‘559988BE7BA87FD296481D4BB19F42CD7B2E351FD812F56A98C94’ +
‘4250E913E9E744A86F12AE6C56AF6919556B361B3F5A8F029D820’ +
‘C9E4DCED5094CE6A5076368E1D3ACD133178A9F553939A8441495’ +
‘EFC73CC94B67E753CFA541EC4EC95757EA5774D4978E9E0E56BCA’ +
‘4B633C22D673D64EBAAE0EBC0AB6AB3C940A431CAC57C4CBD6E8C’ +
‘E3A024CAB84A5490A5B398A2BBCAD59EA578855CEFA2A31EC504D’ +
‘FA7ECFB0F72A2EA9A4AA85631A847A1C4422755D7CCFD3F0852F5’ +
‘75779644893D4EAB4DD196F9F0C87A14BF00769A0634’);
Repeat //
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15 ,15 ,35 ,50 ,15);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(FindBitmap(Existing, x, y));
If(FindBitmap(Existing, x, y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 15, 15, 15, 58, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(1500);
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
Wait(650);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 15, 15, 15, 59, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
HoldMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x, y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;

Procedure Ender;
Begin
If(FindColor(x, y, 3879730, 343, 407, 501, 560))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 15 ,14, 10, 64, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);

End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure credits;
begin
Writeln(’#########################################################’)
WriteLn(’#Thanks for using Sebos… #’)
WriteLn(’#RuneScape Window Opener! #’)
WriteLn(’#Another thanks to MJordan for the credits =) #’)
WriteLn(’#For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing #’)
WriteLn(’#And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR! #’)
WriteLn(’#########################################################’)
end;

{+++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[ MAIN LOOP ]
[ Don’t Touch ]
[+++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Begin
ActivateClient;
IE_Finder;
Getself.Hide;
BoredMouse;
IE_Tool;
RuneScape;
FindThatGame;
Credits;
Ender;
GetSelf.Show;
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows XP Shutdown.wav’);
End.[/scar]

350+ lines of script FTW -.-

have fun, I worked out some of the bugs, but it may still be a little buggy.
If anyone can fix it, it will help!

Read full topic
item.source: Modified RuneScape Window Opener(OUT OF BETA) :)
